item.title: Solo Trip from Bangalore to Kovalam: A Practical Travel Guide
item.description: A solo trip from Bangalore to Kovalam offers the perfect blend of long coastal drives, quiet beaches, cultural experiences, and wellness activities. If you’re looking for a getaway that balances relaxation and exploration, Kovalam is one of the best beach destinations you can travel to on your own. This guide keeps the original route and itinerary intact while making the plan clearer, more
